attributes.action: Run the country with significantly less than 6,000,000 employees in the Public Sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned do not accept that the figure of almost 6,000,000 people directly employed by the public sector is appropriate for the UK.

We want to see a scaling back of the public sector natural attrition (e.g. retirements and resignations allied to a recruitment ban OR very limited recruitment allied to an effective attrition rate of a couple of % (let 5% go, employ 2 or 3% as replacements).

This will preclude the need for tax hikes.

While is will not necessarily lead to tax cuts, it will give the "ordinary citizen" some breathing space from increased taxes and increasingly inventive way in which to extract taxation for many years.

This clearly is a politician's / spin-meisters dream come true - recruiting civil servants whilst not increasing taxes ... Sir Humphrey would be proud !!
